payload.text:
**Verifying and integrating theme toggle**

I’m reviewing whether the theme toggle component from `@ui/shadcn` is properly integrated, especially in the layout or header, to ensure the app can switch dark mode on and off. It looks like the `ThemeProvider` sets a default dark theme, but I want to be sure the toggle component is imported and accessible. Since the user asked to apply dark theme in `@app/web/gapyear`, I’m confirming alias usage and checking CSS classes for dark mode support before finalizing the plan update.

payload.text:
**Applying smooth theme transition styles**

I’m updating the layout to add transition effects for color changes on the main container, footer, and wrapping div to create a smoother theme switch experience. I’m also refining the header’s styling and customizing the ThemeToggle button’s appearance with transparent backgrounds and hover effects for better visual consistency.

payload.message:
Hooked the shared shadcn theme toggle into the Gapyear layout so visitors can switch between light and dark.
- Verified the reusable toggle lives at `packages/ui/shadcn/components/ui/theme-toggle.tsx:1`, using `next-themes` to flip modes.
- Import and render that toggle inside the sticky header for global access in `app/web/gapyear/app/layout.tsx:32-36`.
- Added transition-aware light/dark styling to the layout wrapper, main content, and footer so mode changes propagate smoothly (`app/web/gapyear/app/layout.tsx:32`, `app/web/gapyear/app/layout.tsx:39`, `app/web/gapyear/app/layout.tsx:43`).
- Preserved the existing `Providers` wrapper so the theme provider continues to manage the document class (`app/web/gapyear/app/layout.tsx:31`).

No automated tests run (project already has other unstaged changes in this repo).

Next steps: 1. `pnpm --filter gapyear dev` to verify the toggle and dark theme in the browser.

content.text:
Hooked the shared shadcn theme toggle into the Gapyear layout so visitors can switch between light and dark.
- Verified the reusable toggle lives at `packages/ui/shadcn/components/ui/theme-toggle.tsx:1`, using `next-themes` to flip modes.
- Import and render that toggle inside the sticky header for global access in `app/web/gapyear/app/layout.tsx:32-36`.
- Added transition-aware light/dark styling to the layout wrapper, main content, and footer so mode changes propagate smoothly (`app/web/gapyear/app/layout.tsx:32`, `app/web/gapyear/app/layout.tsx:39`, `app/web/gapyear/app/layout.tsx:43`).
- Preserved the existing `Providers` wrapper so the theme provider continues to manage the document class (`app/web/gapyear/app/layout.tsx:31`).

No automated tests run (project already has other unstaged changes in this repo).

Next steps: 1. `pnpm --filter gapyear dev` to verify the toggle and dark theme in the browser.
